attributes.action: Stop the harrassment and imprisonment of the elderly over "council tax". People on fixed low incomes cannot afford constantly rising bills.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the harrassment and imprisonment of the elderly over "council tax". People on fixed low incomes cannot afford constantly rising bills.
Society is judged by how it treats its weakest members - lets start getting something right.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
